00085 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00086   * @brief  USB Class initialization.
00087   * @param  pClass: pointer of USBDCore_Class_TypeDef
00088   * @retval None
00089   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00090 void USBDClass_Init(USBDCore_Class_TypeDef *pClass)
00091 {
00092   pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.func = USBDClass_MainRoutine;
00093   //pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00094 
00095   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.func = USBDClass_Reset;
00096   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00097 
00098   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.func = USBDClass_StartOfFrame;
00099   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00100 
00101   pClass->CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor = USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor;
00102   pClass->CallBack_ClassSetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface;
00103   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_GetInterface;
00104 
00105   pClass->CallBack_ClassRequest = USBDClass_Request;
00106   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[1] = USBDClass_Endpoint1;
00107   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[2] = USBDClass_Endpoint2;
00108   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[3] = USBDClass_Endpoint3;
00109   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[4] = USBDClass_Endpoint4;
00110   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[5] = USBDClass_Endpoint5;
00111   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[6] = USBDClass_Endpoint6;
00112   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[7] = USBDClass_Endpoint7;
00113 
00114   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00115   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[RETARGET_RX_EPT] = SERIAL_USBDClass_RXHandler;
00116   #endif
00117 
00118   return;
00119 }

00158 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00159   * @brief  USB Device Class Request
00160   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00161   * @retval None
00162   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00163 static void USBDClass_Request(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00164 {
00165   u8 USBCmd = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.bRequest)));
00166   u16 len = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wLength)));
00167 
00168 #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00169   SERIAL_USBDClass_Request(pDev);
00170 #endif
00171 
00172   if (len == 0)
00173   {
00174     return;
00175   }
00176   switch (USBCmd)
00177   {
00178     case CLASS_REQ_00_CODE_UNDEFINED:
00179       break;
00180     case CLASS_REQ_01_SET_CUR:
00181       USBDClass_SET_CUR(pDev);
00182       break;
00183     case CLASS_REQ_81_GET_CUR:
00184       USBDClass_GET_CUR(pDev);
00185       break;
00186     case CLASS_REQ_02_SET_MIN:
00187       USBDClass_SET_MIN(pDev);
00188       break;
00189     case CLASS_REQ_82_GET_MIN:
00190       USBDClass_GET_MIN(pDev);
00191       break;
00192     case CLASS_REQ_03_SET_MAX:
00193       USBDClass_SET_MAX(pDev);
00194       break;
00195     case CLASS_REQ_83_GET_MAX:
00196       USBDClass_GET_MAX(pDev);
00197       break;
00198     case CLASS_REQ_04_SET_RES:
00199       USBDClass_SET_RES(pDev);
00200       break;
00201     case CLASS_REQ_84_GET_RES:
00202       USBDClass_GET_RES(pDev);
00203       break;
00204     case CLASS_REQ_85_SET_MEM:
00205       USBDClass_SET_MEM(pDev);
00206       break;
00207     case CLASS_REQ_85_GET_MEM:
00208       USBDClass_GET_MEM(pDev);
00209       break;
00210     case CLASS_REQ_FF_GET_STAT:
00211     USBDClass_GET_STAT(pDev);
00212       break;
00213 
00214     // others not support
00215     default:
00216       break;
00217   }
00218   return;
00219 }
00220

00226 static void USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)

00231 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00232   * @brief  USB Device Class Standard Request - SET_INTERFACE
00233   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00234   * @retval None
00235   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00236 static void USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00237 {
00238   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 0;
00239   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00240 }
00241 
00242 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00243   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Set CUR Request.
00244   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00245   * @retval None
00246   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00247 static void USBDClass_SET_CUR(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00248 {
00249   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00250   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00251 
00252   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00253   {
00254     case  AC_INTERFACE_NUM:
00255       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00256       {
00257         case CONTROL_ID:
00258 
00259           break;
00260         case IT_ID:
00261 
00262           break;
00263         case FU_ID:
00264           switch (USBValueH)
00265           {
00266             case MUTE_CONTROL:
00267               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UAC_bMuteControl;
00268               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00269               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00270               break;
00271             case VOLUME_CONTROL:
00272               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UAC_sVolumeControl;
00273               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00274               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00275               break;
00276             case BASS_CONTROL:
00277               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UAC_bBassControl;
00278               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00279               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00280               break;
00281           }
00282           break;
00283         case OT_ID:
00284 
00285           break;
00286         default:
00287 
00288           break;
00289       }
00290       break;
00291     case  AS_INTERFACE_NUM:
00292       break;
00293   }
00294 }
00295 
00296 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00297   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Get CUR Request.
00298   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00299   * @retval None
00300   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00301 static void USBDClass_GET_CUR(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00302 {
00303   u16 USBIndex = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wIndex)));
00304   u8 USBValueH = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.wValueH)));
00305 
00306   switch ((USBIndex & 0x00FF))                  //switch interface
00307   {
00308     case  AC_INTERFACE_NUM:
00309       switch ((USBIndex & 0xFF00) >> 8)         //switch ID
00310       {
00311         case CONTROL_ID:
00312 
00313           break;
00314         case IT_ID:
00315 
00316           break;
00317         case FU_ID:
00318           switch (USBValueH)
00319           {
00320             case MUTE_CONTROL:
00321               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UAC_bMuteControl;
00322               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00323               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00324               break;
00325             case VOLUME_CONTROL:
00326               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UAC_sVolumeControl;
00327               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00328               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00329               break;
00330             case BASS_CONTROL:
00331               pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&UAC_bBassControl;
00332               pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = pDev->Request.wLength;
00333               pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00334               break;
00335           }
00336           break;
00337         case OT_ID:
00338 
00339           break;
00340         default:
00341 
00342           break;
00343       }
00344       break;
00345     case  AS_INTERFACE_NUM:
00346       break;
00347   }
00348 }

00644 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00645   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Set MEM Request.
00646   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00647   * @retval None
00648   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00649 static void USBDClass_SET_MEM(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00650 {
00651 }

00704 {
00705   return;
00706 }
00707 */
00708 
00709 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00710   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint handler
00711   * @param  EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00712   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT7
00713   * @retval None
00714   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00715 __ALIGN4 u32 Buf[48];
00716 static void USBDClass_Endpoint4(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00717 {
00718   /* Read Receive data.                                                                                     */
00719   u32 len = USBDCore_EPTReadOUTData(EPTn, (u32 *)Buf, _EP4LEN);
00720   if (len != _EP4LEN)
00721   {
00722     printf("\r\nLen Error\r\n");
00723   }
00724   else
00725   {
00726     I2S_BufferWrite(Buf);
00727   }
00728 
00729   return;
00730 }
00731
